title: Ring of Fire
description: Dark and brooding, the vampire, Volmere, is the slut of the paranormal universe. Aside from sexual prowess, he has no redeeming value. But is redemption only a human heartbeat away?After almost four hundred miserable years, Volmere is about to face the biggest challenge of his life...falling in love for the first time. Battling a demon attack transforms Volmere and the two gay demon hunters he tries to save.Can two ordinary gay demon hunters find love in the tattooed arms of a twisted vampire? Aiden and Travis are looking for a third lover to take the place of their deceased partner. No way do they want or need a vampire to complete them. It doesnâ€™t matter how spectacular he looks or how good he is in bed. Or does it?
author: Lee Avalone
